item.title: One Source to Rule Them All - DSLs as a Single Source of Truth for Multiple Tasks with Ivan Ponomarev
item.description: We are very excited to welcome Ivan Ponomarev as the first Brighton Kotlin speaker of 2024. Ivan is a Staff Software Engineer at Synthesized and will be giving a talk on - One Source to Rule Them All: Kotlin DSLs as a Single Source of Truth for Multiple Tasks In this talk, I will discuss how the DSL feature in the Kotlin language aids in building better products. We’ll explore the motivation for using DSLs, differentiating between external and internal DSLs, and delve into the advantages and limitations of internal Kotlin DSLs.
